text.text_translated: To find the rest of the middle-sized asteroids, NASA needs money to build NEOCam, which is a 0.5-metre space telescope that would use infrared light to locate them. If they get the money, they could probably achieve their goal in ten years. However, even after the asteroids are located, a special team would still need to work out how to defend the planet from the most dangerous ones.
